scripts.clean:reports: rimraf cypress/reports && rimraf cypress/screenshots && rimraf cypress/videos
scripts.test: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true && npm run report:merge && npm run report:gen
scripts.test:html: npm run test && echo Relat√≥rio: cypress/reports/html/index.html
